help-file.title: ANIMALIST
help-file.content:
The Animalist specializes in the feral nature of his art. They are able to summon larger pets, and can even take the form of certain animals.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Charm Animal 41st level: Shapechange
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 9th circle: Greater Summon Beast 11th circle: Essence of the Wolf
